item.description:
Hi everyone, lets all get out and show our support for Ron Paul. Southern CT people are trying to put together a huge sign wave. This is what their invite says: "New Haven area would be a perfect spot for a huge Ron Paul sign wave/ rally, and the steps of the New Haven court house is a perfect corner with a lot of space and only a block away from the News Channel 8 headquarters. Everyone is welcome, come check out what the Ron Paul libertarian movement is all about." Bring signs, pamphlets, and a positive attitude !

http://www.facebook.com/events/344673255557635/
item.name: Ron Paul Sign Wave / Rally in New Haven
